import React from 'react'; import BookingForm from '../Home/bookingForm'; import Crysta from '../Images/cryy.jpg'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import TripDetailsCard from './TripDetailsCard'; const CarList = () => { const carData = [ { id: 1, name: "Toyota Innova", seats: 6, price: 1200, image: Crysta, seatsLeft: 5, Date:"08/01/2025", time:"5.15 AM", features: [ "Air Conditioned Luxury SUV", "Comfortable & Spacious Seating", "Female Passenger Safety Standards", ], }, { id: 2, name: "Toyota Innova", seats: 6, price: 1200, image: Crysta, seatsLeft: 5, Date:"08/01/2025", time:"6.15 AM", features: [ "Air Conditioned Luxury SUV", "Comfortable & Spacious Seating", "Female Passenger Safety Standards", ], }, { id: 3, name: "Toyota Innova", seats: 6, price: 1200, seatsLeft: 5, image: Crysta, Date:"08/01/2025", time:"7.15 AM", features: [ "Air Conditioned Luxury SUV", "Comfortable & Spacious Seating", "Female Passenger Safety Standards", ], }, { id: 4, name: "Toyota Innova", seats: 6, price: 1200, image: Crysta, seatsLeft: 5, Date:"08/01/2025", time:"8.15 AM", features: [ "Air Conditioned Luxury SUV", "Comfortable & Spacious Seating", "Female Passenger Safety Standards", ], }, { id: 5, name: "Toyota Innova", seats: 6, price: 1200, image: Crysta, seatsLeft: 5, Date:"08/01/2025", time:"9.15 AM", features: [ "Air Conditioned Luxury SUV", "Comfortable & Spacious Seating", "Female Passenger Safety Standards", ], }, { id: 6, name: "Toyota Innova", seats: 6, price: 1200, image: Crysta, seatsLeft: 5, Date:"08/01/2025", time:"10.15 AM", features: [ "Air Conditioned Luxury SUV", "Comfortable & Spacious Seating", "Female Passenger Safety Standards", ], }, ]; return (
{/* Trip Details Section */} {/* Car List Section */}
{/* Tabs */} {/*
*/} {/* Car Cards */} {carData.map((car) => (

{car.name}

    {car.features.map((feature, index) => (
  • • {feature}
    • ))}

); }; export default CarList;
